title: Course Matcher
description: Helps users find their next employer by matching them through relevant courses.  The database is seeded with 1,000 courses through a Coursera API Parser in the Ruby on Rails backend.  The Frontend is built using React for efficient reusable components, and redux for complex state management.  React-Router-Dom and React-Paginate are also used to improve user navigation.

title: Shoppies
description: Movie app that integrates with the omdb api for users to be able to search and nominate movies.  Uses local storage to persist nominations when a user leaves or refreshes the page.

title: Malay
description: Interactive platform for discovering and sharing home decor and furniture. Modeled custom database schema and REST API with Active, Record, Postgres and Ruby on Rails.  Wrote custom CSS for modern styling used React for reusable front end components.  The app allows users to search through different posts and save them to their profile. Users can also leave comments and create their own posts.

title: Bruno's Treats
description: E-commerce site featuring dog products, named after my own rescue, Bruno.  Allows users to browse and purchase products.  Used cookies to persist user information and store it within sessions to keep users logged in.
